title: Summoners' Society is excited to announce our partnership with Bamboo Project.

embed.description: Path to Pro - Beta The Bamboo Project and community is a high quality training environment put together by professional coaches and managers to help you grow. We've provided more than 350 hours of coached scrims to date, and our discord server has over 250 members. We're not even close to our p...

body:
Summoners' Society is excited to announce our partnership with Bamboo Project. 

Bamboo Project is creating an awesome grass roots program called 'Path to Pro'. This is an amazing project that we are super excited to announce as we love supporting these kinds of initiatives! Bamboo Project's three core values are Community, Discipline and Respect. This is a place where everyone is welcome no matter your rank or gender.

As the new League of legends season is staring up they are looking for people to join their Beta Test! 

They are offering players high level training and effective coaching :seedling:

Give it a try and sign up to their beta session next week!

Sign up: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FYcFpxTw12VBXHKDGSKo_PQ5exlCMUD3E3aF-s0u3mU/edit?usp=sharing
